job title: Business / Data Analyst - Nielsen / IRI Experience
job description:
Position Business / Data Analyst - Nielsen / IRI Experience
Location Northern Suburbs
Starts ready to interview
Duration Full Time
Status Full Time
Rate $60-$70K + 5% DOE

Our client just north of the city is seeking a Business / Data Analyst with 3-5 years of experience to join their team on a fulltime basis.

This client is accessible by both the Purple line and Metra + will have flexibility to work from home 1 day a week + has an amazing benefit package and culture.

Must have Nielsen syndicated POS database experience to be considered!

The Business / Data Analyst will be responsible for:
  • Develop insight-led category recommendations through analysis of promotions and pricing
  • Understand major customer performance and develop presentations to expand current business
  • Provide analysis and recommendations to customers and the business with regards to range management, promotions, pricing and display
  • Build/optimize regular reporting (monthly, quarterly)
  • Create short, mid and long-term plans to include budget and resource requirements
  • Prepare and deliver new product roll out presentations to priority customers and develop ongoing relationships
The ideal Business / Data Analyst:
  • CPG experience
  • Client facing, comfortable telling a story
  • Data driven, analytical, strong presenter able to articulate data concepts to non-expert audiences
  • Expert using Nielsen and IRI analytical tools
  • Advanced MS Excel and PowerPoint
  • Highly organized to manage various priorities
